mapper.insert: insert into companyreview (cr_comment, cr_starRt, cr_regDate, cr_category, user_id, ci_id) values (#{cr_comment}, #{cr_starRt}, now(), #{cr_category}, 1, #{ci_id})
mapper.select: select IFNULL(avg(cr_starRt), 0.0) from (select cr_starRt from companyreview where companyreview.ci_id = (select ci_id from companyinfo where ci_companyName = #{ci_companyName})) starRt;

select IFNULL(avg(cr_starRt), 0.0) from (select cr_starRt from companyreview where companyreview.ci_id = (select ci_id from companyinfo where ci_companyName = #{ci_companyName} and cr_category = #{cr_category})) starRt;
